attributes.action: All MPs to resign their seats to trigger a general election
attributes.additional_details: MPs won’t vote to trigger an election so we must petition them to all resign their seats.
attributes.background: The government has failed to deliver Brexit and the house of commons is severely divided. No agreement can be reached. The country is in a dangerous place with views on all sides extremely strong. The only way to a new start is a new government. An election is needed.

rejection.details:
This would be a decision for individual MP's, 

You might like to sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/264215
